REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9234 reute r f BC-XEROX-<XRX>-SELLS-CON 03-18 0051

TEXT.TITLE: XEROX <XRX> SELLS CONNECTICUT PROPERTY
TEXT.BODY: Xerox Corp said it sold a 102-acre site in Greenwich, Conn., to a limited partnership for 10.5 mln dlrs. Other details were not disclosed. The purchaser was identified as Greenwich King Street Associates II Limited Partnership. Reuter
